text: 13.39: Ais 53.11; Ro 3.28; 8.3; 10.4; Hi 7.19Nde mba Moses suaŋgi tɨvi, nde fhum muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzgip, khaŋ nde suaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara, nde tɨvir vhuuiŋ ga mbui gumgi ma. Fhuvara. Nde kha guma Zisas, nde ana khothivi gumgi, ana za nde fhum muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana za nta vhɨzgip, ana kha zɨn nden kamɨnga, nde tɨvir vhuuiŋ ga mbui gumgi ma.
